alert.note: Alert for Nelson; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SPENCER...NORTH CENTRAL NELSON AND CENTRAL BULLITT COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pioneer Village, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bardstown, Shepherdsville, Pioneer Village, Mount Washington, Hebron Estates, Fox Chase, Highgrove, Bardstown Junction, Hobbs and Smithville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.
